ActJudges Act
SubjectShirley van der Hoop ** ANNUITY ** The Hon. John Peter van der Hoop **
PrecisGranting of an ANNUITY to SHIRLEY VAN DER HOOP, survivor of the Hon. John Peter van der Hoop, Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, effective February 12, 2014.
AttachmentsAttachment
